statements: UPDATE transaction_records SET amount = 1000.50, description = 'Payment for services' WHERE id = '6c84fb90-12c4-11eb-adc1-0242ac120002';
UPDATE transaction_records SET description = 'Refund for order #123', amount = 500.75 WHERE account_id = '7b0d3991-8875-44c8-b6f4-092e45beae12';
UPDATE transaction_records SET amount = 500.00, description = 'New transaction description' WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';

UPDATE transaction_records SET description = 'Updated transaction description', amount = 1000.00 WHERE account_id = '98765432-10ab-cdef-1234-567890abcdef' AND transaction_date = '2022-05-15 12:30:00';
UPDATE encrypted_transactions SET encrypted_data = 'new_data_value' WHERE transaction_id = 1;
UPDATE audit_logs SET audit_timestamp = '2022-01-15 12:30:00' WHERE log_id = 5;
UPDATE encrypted_transactions SET encrypted_data = 'New data' WHERE transaction_id = 100;
UPDATE audit_logs SET audit_timestamp = NOW() WHERE transaction_id = 200;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 100.50 WHERE transaction_id = 1;
UPDATE audit_logs SET user_id = 2, action = 'Updated', timestamp = NOW() WHERE log_id = 5;
UPDATE transactions SET account_id = 1001, amount = 500.25 WHERE transaction_id = 101;
UPDATE accounts SET account_type = 'Savings', balance = balance + 1000 WHERE account_id = 2001;
UPDATE financial_institution SET transaction_amount = 500.25, transaction_details = 'Updated transaction' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE transaction_audit SET auditor_id = 2, audit_date = '2022-09-15 10:30:00' WHERE audit_id = 4;
UPDATE financial_institution SET transaction_amount = 500.75, transaction_details = 'Payment for services' WHERE id = 123;
UPDATE transaction_audit SET audit_date = '2021-10-15 09:30:00', auditor_id = 456, transaction_id = 789 WHERE audit_id = 987;
UPDATE encrypted_transactions SET transaction_amount = 500.75 WHERE transaction_id = 1001;
UPDATE accounts SET account_balance = 10000.50, account_holder_name = 'John Doe' WHERE account_id = 2001;
UPDATE encrypted_transactions SET transaction_amount = 1500.50 WHERE transaction_id = 1001;
UPDATE accounts SET account_balance = account_balance + 500.00 WHERE account_id = 2001;
